nodes.text: The Agrelcu Haalta, which could be translated as the Aggressive Defender in Basic, was a Dreadnaught-class heavy cruiser that served as the flagship of Troonol. It was the command ship of a Qunaalac fleet that patrolled the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space.

During the Galactic Civil War, Troonol's fleet protected the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space. His fleet consisted of ten Qunaalac warships which he led from his command ship, the Dreadnaught-class heavy cruiser Agrelcu Haalta. The rest of his fleet was a collection of Corellian gunships.

Troonol's fleet heavily patrolled the Pabol Hutta hyperspace route through the Bootana Hutta, where outlanders were not allowed to travel. His fleet regularly patrolled the route between the guardian worlds of Gos Hutta and Mulatan and, more periodically, the routes to Elgit and Varl.
